author: Andrew Restuccia, Catherine Lucey
title: Trump’s Guidelines to Reopen Economy Put Onus on Governors - The Wall Street Journal
description: Trump’s Guidelines to Reopen Economy Put Onus on Governors The Wall Street Journal Trump taps members of Congress to advise on reopening | TheHill The Hill Trump Virus Reopening Guidelines Call for ‘Downward Trajectory’ Bloomberg White House taps members of C…
content:
WASHINGTONPresident Trump outlined broad new federal guidelines for opening up the country that will put the onus on governors to decide how to restart the economies in their states amid mounting fallout from the coronavirus outbreak.
The new guidelines come… [+191 chars]
